project.name: webduino-js
project.description: The Webduino Javascript Core, for Browser and Node.js

params.name: options
params.description: Options to build the board instance.

webduino.Module.name: webduino.Module
webduino.Module.description: A component to be attached to a board. This is an abstract class meant to be extended.

webduino.Transport.name: webduino.Transport
webduino.Transport.description: A messaging mechanism to carry underlying firmata messages. This is an abstract class meant to be extended.

params.name: options
params.description: Options to build the transport instance.

webduino.module.ADXL345.name: webduino.module.ADXL345
webduino.module.ADXL345.description:
The ADXL345 class.

ADXL345 is a small, thin, ultralow power, 3-axis accelerometer.

params.name: board
params.description: The board that the ADXL345 accelerometer is attached to.

params.name: board
params.description: The board the barcode scanner is attached to.

params.name: rxPin
params.description: Receivin pin (number) the barcode scanner is connected to.

params.name: txPin
params.description: Transmitting pin (number) the barcode scanner is connected to.

params.name: board
params.description: The board the button is attached to.

params.name: pin
params.description: The pin the button is connected to.

params.name: buttonMode
params.description: Type of resistor the button is connected to, either Button.PULL_DOWN or Button.PULL_UP.

params.name: sustainedPressInterval
params.description: A period of time when the button is pressed and hold for that long, it would be considered a "sustained press." Measured in ms.

params.name: board
params.description: The board that the buzzer is attached to.

params.name: pin
params.description: The pin that the buzzer is connected to.

webduino.module.Dht.name: webduino.module.Dht
webduino.module.Dht.description:
The Dht Class.

DHT is sensor for measuring temperature and humidity.

params.name: board
params.description: The board that the DHT is attached to.

params.name: pin
params.description: The pin that the DHT is connected to.

webduino.module.HX711.name: webduino.module.HX711
webduino.module.HX711.description:
The HX711 Class.

HX711 is a precision 24-bit analogto-digital converter (ADC) designed for weigh scales.

params.name: board
params.description: The board that the IRLed is attached to.

params.name: sckPin
params.description: The pin that Serial Clock Input is attached to.

params.name: dtPin
params.description: The pin that Data Output is attached to.

webduino.module.IRLed.name: webduino.module.IRLed
webduino.module.IRLed.description:
The IRLed Class.

IR LED (Infrared LED) is widely used for remote controls and night-vision cameras.

params.name: board
params.description: The board that the IRLed is attached to.

params.name: board
params.description: The board that the IRLed is attached to.

params.name: pin
params.description: The pin that the IRLed is connected to.

params.name: board
params.description: The board the LED is attached to.

params.name: pin
params.description: The pin the LED is connected to.

params.name: driveMode
params.description: Drive mode the LED is operating at, either Led.SOURCE_DRIVE or Led.SYNC_DRIVE.

webduino.module.Max7219.name: webduino.module.Max7219
webduino.module.Max7219.description:
The Max7219 Class.

MAX7219 is compact, serial input/output
common-cathode display drivers that interface
microprocessors (ÂµPs) to 7-segment numeric LED displays
of up to 8 digits, bar-graph displays, or 64 individual LEDs.

params.name: board
params.description: The board that the Max7219 is attached to.

webduino.module.Photocell.name: webduino.module.Photocell
webduino.module.Photocell.description:
The Photocell class.

Photocell is small, inexpensive, low-power sensor that allow you to detect light.

params.name: board
params.description: Board that the photocell is attached to.

params.name: analogPinNumber
params.description: The pin that the photocell is connected to.

webduino.module.RFID.name: webduino.module.RFID
webduino.module.RFID.description:
The RFID class.

RFID reader is used to track nearby tags by wirelessly reading a tag's unique ID.

params.name: board
params.description: Board that the RFID is attached to.

params.name: board
params.description: The board the RGB LED is attached to.

params.name: redLedPin
params.description: The pin the red LED is connected to.

params.name: greenLedPin
params.description: The pin the green LED is connected to.

params.name: blueLedPin
params.description: The pin the blue LED is connected to.

params.name: driveMode
params.description: Drive mode the RGB LED is operating at, either RGBLed.COMMON_ANODE or RGBLed.COMMON_CATHODE.

params.name: board
params.description: Board that the soil is attached to.

params.name: analogPinNumber
params.description: The pin that soil is attached to.

params.name: board
params.description: The board the ultrasonic sensor is attached to.

params.name: trigger
params.description: The trigger pin the sensor is connected to.

params.name: echo
params.description: The echo pin the sensor is connected to.

params.name: options
params.description: Options to build a proper transport

webduino.transport.NodeMqttTransport.name: webduino.transport.NodeMqttTransport
webduino.transport.NodeMqttTransport.description: Conveying messages over MQTT protocol, in Node.JS.

params.name: options
params.description: Options to build a proper transport

classitems.description: Set maximum number of listeners that is allow to bind on an emitter.
classitems.name: setMaxListeners

classitems.description: Emit an event of certain type.
classitems.name: emit

classitems.description: Add a listener for a certain type of event.
classitems.name: addListener

classitems.description: Add a one-time listener for a certain type of event.
classitems.name: once

classitems.description: Remove a listener for certain type of event.
classitems.name: removeListener

classitems.description: Remove all listeners of certain type.
classitems.name: removeAllListeners

classitems.description: Return the listener list bound to certain type of event.
classitems.name: listeners

classitems.description: Count the number of listeners of an emitter.
classitems.name: listenerCount

classitems.description: Fires when a transport is opened.
classitems.name: TransportEvent.OPEN

classitems.description: Fires when a transport receives a message.
classitems.name: TransportEvent.MESSAGE

classitems.description: Fires when a transport get an error.
classitems.name: TransportEvent.ERROR

classitems.description: Fires when a transport is closed.
classitems.name: TransportEvent.CLOSE

classitems.description: Fires when a transport is re-opened.
classitems.name: TransportEvent.REOPEN

classitems.description: Indicates if the state of the transport is open.
classitems.name: isOpen

params.name: payload
params.description: The actual data to be sent.

classitems.description: Flush any buffered data of the transport.
classitems.name: flush

classitems.description: Fires when the accelerometer senses a value change.
classitems.name: ADXL234Event.MESSAGE

classitems.description: The state indicating whether the accelerometer is detecting.
classitems.name: state

classitems.description: Set the base axis for calculation.
classitems.name: setBaseAxis

params.name: axis
params.description: Axis to be set to, either `x`, `y`, or `z`.

params.name: detectTime
params.description: The time period for detecting, in ms.

classitems.description: Fires when the barcode scanner scans a code.
classitems.name: BarcodeEvent.MESSAGE

classitems.description: The state indicating whether the module is scanning.
classitems.name: state

classitems.description: Fires when a button is pressed.
classitems.name: ButtonEvent.PRESS

classitems.description: Fires when a button is released.
classitems.name: ButtonEvent.RELEASE

classitems.description: Fires when a button is long-pressed.
classitems.name: ButtonEvent.LONG_PRESS

classitems.description: Fires when a button is sustained-pressed.
classitems.name: ButtonEvent.SUSTAINED_PRESS

classitems.description: Fires when error occured while reading value.
classitems.name: DhtEvent.READ_ERROR

props.name: data
props.description:
returned data from sensor,
                humidity and temperature will be passed into callback function as parameters.

    callback()

will be transformed to

     callback({humidity: humidity, temperature: temperature})

automatically.

classitems.description: Fires when the value of weight has changed.
classitems.name: HX711.MESSAGE

classitems.description: The state indicating whether the module is measuring.
classitems.name: state

classitems.description: Fires when error occured while receiving data.
classitems.name: IRRecvEvent.MESSAGE_ERROR

classitems.description: The state indicating whether the IRLed is receiving.
classitems.name: state

classitems.description: Indicates the source LED drive mode.
classitems.name: SOURCE_DRIVE

classitems.description: Indicates the synchronous LED drive mode.
classitems.name: SYNC_DRIVE

classitems.description: The intensity indicating brightness of Max7219.
classitems.name: intensity

classitems.description: Fires when the value of brightness has changed.
classitems.name: PhotocellEvent.MESSAGE

classitems.description: The state indicating whether the module is measuring.
classitems.name: state

classitems.description: The state indicating whether the module is reading.
classitems.name: isReading

classitems.description: Stop reading RFID and remove all listeners.
classitems.name: destroy

classitems.description: Light up and mix colors with the LEDs.
classitems.name: setColor

params.name: red
params.description: The brightness of the red LED.

params.name: green
params.description: The brightness of the green LED.

params.name: blue
params.description: The brightness of the blue LED.

params.name: callback
params.description: Function to call when the color is set.

classitems.description: Indicates the common anode drive mode.
classitems.name: COMMON_ANODE

classitems.description: Indicates the common cathode drive mode.
classitems.name: COMMON_CATHODE

classitems.description: Fires when the value of humidity has changed.
classitems.name: PhotocellEvent.MESSAGE

classitems.description: The state indicating whether the module is scanning.
classitems.name: state

classitems.description: Fires when receiving a ping response.
classitems.name: UltrasonicEvent.PING

classitems.description: Fires when receiving a ping-error response.
classitems.name: UltrasonicEvent.PING_ERROR

classitems.description: Distance returned from the previous transmission.
classitems.name: distance

classitems.description: Transmit an ultrasonic to sense the distance at a (optional) given interval.
classitems.name: ping

params.name: callback
params.description: Callback when a response is returned.

params.name: interval
params.description: Interval between each transmission. If omitted the ultrasonic will be transmitted once.

return.description: A promise when the ping response is returned. Will not return anything if a callback function is given.

classitems.description: Reconnect period when MQTT connection goes down. Measured in seconds.
classitems.name: RECONNECT_PERIOD

classitems.description: MQTT keepalive interval. Measured in seconds.
classitems.name: KEEPALIVE_INTERVAL

classitems.description: Time to wait before throwing connection timeout exception. Measured in seconds.
classitems.name: CONNECT_TIMEOUT

classitems.description: Reconnect period when MQTT connection goes down. Measured in seconds.
classitems.name: RECONNECT_PERIOD

classitems.description: MQTT keepalive interval. Measured in seconds.
classitems.name: KEEPALIVE_INTERVAL

classitems.description: Time to wait before throwing connection timeout exception. Measured in seconds.
classitems.name: CONNECT_TIMEOUT
